summary: CAR WAS STATIONARY.  NO POWER AND COULD NOT START THE ENGINE.  INSPECTED UNDER THE HOOD AND THERE WAS WHILE POWDER SPOTS EVERY WHERE AROUND THE ENGINE.  REMOVED THE BATTERY COVER AND BATTERY APPEARED TO HAVE EXPLODED.  POSITIVE TERMINAL WAS COMPLETELY CORRODED.  DEALER CLEANED AREA AND REPLACED A NEW BATTERY. NOW STARTS AND RUNS.
